intro: In Bas&Aer's workshops, we combine strategic and playful methods to strengthen your company in the areas of communication, identity and innovation and to efficiently develop sustainable solutions.

gallery.alt: In the workshop, a woman writes down her thoughts on pieces of paper.
The notes are organized by the facilitator.

dynamic.text: Whether it is about the positioning of your company, the development of an innovative service offer or the access to your target group - the workshops of Bas&Aer offer space, time and the necessary know-how to look intensively at existing challenges and to work out a vision together: In this way, we find individual strengths and authentic stories that remain in the memory and touch the heart.

With its findings, each workshop sets the decisive course for further development: with a profound understanding of the initial situation and requirements, as well as a clear perspective on concrete implementation possibilities, all participants can be better involved. And that saves time and money.

image.alt: Two people discuss the ideas collected.

dynamic.text: In our workshops we work at eye level. We include the strengths, perspectives and knowledge of all the people around the table. In addition to a range of creative methods, we rely on clear moderation: empathetic and reflective, imaginative and critical.

Our approach is a balance of intuition and discussion. With these fundamental components of creative work, we loosen your thinking, tease out innovative ideas and develop precise, consistent concepts.
Click on the sidebar on the right for a first impression of our workshop formats or ask us for a workshop tailored to your individual needs and requirements:
